pr_title: fix: circular ref results in stackoverflow

timeline.message: fix: circular ref results in stackoverflow

timeline.bodyText: Add new line at the end of file
timeline.author: mshabarov

timeline.bodyText: I would improve the javadoc so as to describe what this class generally does, not what it fixes. Something like: "A helper class representing the cache for storing an already validated Bean values".
timeline.author: mshabarov

timeline.bodyText: Does it being cleared at some point? Do we need a clear method for this cache?
timeline.author: mshabarov

replies.bodyText: It relies on Java's garbage collection.
replies.author: haijian-vaadin

timeline.bodyText: Please add a javadoc for these methods.
timeline.author: mshabarov
